replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
clearlag的问题，换成neverlag吧，或设置一下
望采纳为最佳答案，谢谢

replies.author: Sakura_Lu
replies.txt_content:
升级快快 发表于 2015-9-20 12:47
我装了clearcag
那就把clearlag 换成neverlag

replies.author: Boys_Craft
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Withered_Boss
replies.txt_content: 请将现有的所有清理类插件删除 然后安装never lag

replies.author: topjxr
replies.txt_content: 延长clearlag的时间间隔（interval）应该可以，如果还不行就试试去掉这个插件观察
